post.body: I'll do that. Thanks. :)
Ahhhhhhh! Writer's block is the WORST!
Yay for @jessicamast! (@jessicamast and I went to college together, BTW).
I've been tempted to correct comment typos, too...
hahaha!
"tomorrow" is often a saving grace
yay!
i'm just not sure i'm up for the parenting thing...
are you going to BlissDom '09? Just curious...
actually my hubs did it. Credit where it's due.
upgraded to WP 2.7 no prob
night
ha about the KY Jelly
Yay!
We're eating Belgian waffles for lunch... But my husband is the one making them. :)
What more can you do?
To a certain extent, then, they're making the decision for you... it stinks for you, but if they're not willing to make time...
Not a parent, but have lots of friends w/ kids. I'm willing just to hang out with them while they do their thing. A possibility?
I'm still here. :)
Although how anyone can keep 2000 followers straight is beyond me. :)
Ahhhh... I'm with you now. :)
Huh... I'm having any trouble... or if I am, I've just not noticed it? Hmmm...
I looked at DH today and said, "What are we doing for Christmas for each other?" His response? buying presents. Need to get on it.
Interesting list Lynn. Thanks for passing it along. :)
Heh...
I don't get the anger either...
MrTweet ROCKS!
I checked out the #Blissdom09 girl's blog. The one who's so excited to meet you. Cute cute cute!
I agree... one can feel free to dislike him and/or his policies... but he is our president.
I agree. "Graceland" is wonderful... and the video to "You Can Call Me Al" is genius, I think. Love Chevy Chase in it. :)
And my husband and I aren't planning to have any, but every time I see the commercial abt. Monday's special on TLC, I tear up.
I'll be getting ready to drive to Nashville this time next month. :)
Ha! That's funny... in the best way. :)
Um... I'm looking forward to going back to work. I need a little structure.
eYUP... that's what it is, most likely...
I just reserved this book after seeing your Tweet. Thanks!
I feel similarly about work. If I weren't scheduled to go in tomorrow, I might have gone anyway... I need some structure.
I LOVE "You've Got Mail... Who am I kidding? I love Tom Hanks...
you know you can restrict your profile to only friends, don't you? I surely do!
See, I won't have non-IRL friends as Facebook friends. :) No bloggy friends I've met either... just one of my boundaries...
Stuipd, stupid economy...
Yeah... so I've heard. ;) I just put a warning on my FB status... ACK!
Oh, that's so not fun. I'm sorry...
I head back to work tomorrow, too... And I'm kind of glad... need to get back to my routine.
GROAN at your "phisher of men" comment. :)
This was a HUGE problem last night... it IS a phishing scam.
I need to write a column for Blissfully Domestic's Photo Bliss... but I have no ideas. Do you have ideas for columns? @ or DM me. Please! :)
I just watched a Christmas episode of "Little House on the Prairie." About cried sixteen times.
It is still 2008, right? http://tinyurl.com/5wa3ch
RT @Photo_Bliss Have an IPhone or IPod Touch? We're giving away a Pogo Stylus that's compatible! http://tinyurl.com/5uoc9v
I just saw a commercial for The Clapper. :)
I'm really liking the movie's end credits, though. :)
We just finished watching WALL-E. I liked it, but didn't love it.
Pray for Jeffrey http://tinyurl.com/9ttgdx
RT @problogger: Reading: 7 Secrets to Getting Your Next Job Using Social Media - http://tinyurl.com/85hdra
I'm watching Father of the Bride II. I LOVE this movie.
I just got what I suspect is a phishing thing on my Facebook wall...
Dear Mr. Customer Service Manâ€¦ http://tinyurl.com/9lknkj
Guy at customer service would not just PROCESS MY REQUEST... wanted to make small talk... am NOT in the mood this morning.
